   --------------------------------------------------------------------------
       The Apache Tomcat Native - Miscellaneous Documentation                
                                                                             
   Preface                                                                   
     This is the Changelog for Tomcat Native. This changelog does not        
     contain all updates and fixes to the Tomcat Native (yet). It should     
     contain fixes made only after December 19th 2007, when the new          
     documentation project for Tomcat Native was started.                    
                                                                             
   Changes between 1.1.16 and 1.1.17                                         
     [3]update Arrange build after svn reorganisation (rjung)                
     [4]fix    [5]47852: Fix some Javadoc errors. Patch provided by Sebb.    
               (rjung)                                                       
     [6]fix    [7]46950: Fix SSL renegotiation in combination with client    
               certificates. The complete solution also needs a fix in       
               Tomcat's Java code. (markt)                                   
     [8]fix    Align method names and signatures of native C code and java   
               code. (markt, rjung)                                          
     [9]fix    [10]42728: Remove memory leak. (markt)                        
     [11]fix   [12]46457: Fix use of multicast. (markt)                      
     [13]fix   Fix API name for recvfrom (mturk)                             
     [14]fix   Allow building against APR 1.3 (mturk)                        
     [15]fix   Improve fix for [16]43327 with better handling for IPv6       
               addresses (markt)                                             
                                                                             
   Changes between 1.1.15 and 1.1.16                                         
     [17]fix Fix API name for recvfrom (mturk)                               
     [18]fix Allow building against APR 1.3 (mturk)                          
     [19]fix Improve fix for [20]43327 with better handling for IPv6         
             addresses (markt)                                               
                                                                             
   Changes between 1.1.14 and 1.1.15                                         
     [21]fix [22]43327: Socket bind fail because mixing IPv4/IPv6 (markt,    
             jfclere)                                                        
     [23]fix [24]44864: Use additional check for SSL verify like with        
             mod_ssl for SSLVerifyClient=optionalNoCA. (mturk)               
                                                                             
   Changes between 1.1.13 and 1.1.14                                         
     [25]fix [26]45071: Reset ttl when Poll.pool remove is false. Additional 
             patch was provided by Alex Barclay. (mturk)                     
     [27]fix Fix optGet that was always throwing exceptions. (jfclere)       
     [28]fix Fix optSet don't throw exception as JAVA prototype doesn't.     
             (jfclere)                                                       
                                                                             
   Changes between 1.1.12 and 1.1.13                                         
     [29]fix IFS problem in native/build/tcnative.m4 (rjung)                 
     [30]fix Wrong gcc link flag in native/build/tcnative.m4 (rjung)         
                                                                             
   Changes between 1.1.11 and 1.1.12                                         
     [31]update Add support of J9VM based JVM. (jfclere)                     
     [32]update Arrange licence in source files. (markt)                     
     [33]update Add two new 'immediate' methods for sending the data. It is  
                the responsibility of the Java callee to deal with the       
                returned values and retry if the error was non-fatal.        
                (mturk)                                                      
     [34]fix    Arrange the check of openssl version. It was failing on      
                Linux. (jfclere)                                             
     [35]fix    Prevent returning APR_SUCCESS when there is something wrong  
                in ssl layer. (jfclere)                                      
     [36]fix    [37]44087: Fix it. (jfclere)
